channel.title: apps on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in apps on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoft’s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook or PC (4 minute read) The first Android 13 Developer Preview built for Pixel phones includes two Cross Device service apps dedicated to connecting Pixels to other devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: Tesla launches ‘TeslaMic,’ a microphone for in-car karaoke (2 minute read) Tesla has launched a microphone designed for its in-car karaoke system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-25
item.description: Spotify tests a TikTok-like vertical video feed in its app (3 minute read) Spotify is currently testing a new vertical video feed feature called Discover.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-25
item.description: Apple’s new M1 Max MacBook Pro may get a virtual turbo button for High Power Mode (2 minute read) The upcoming macOS Monterey will feature a High Power Mode in the new 16-inch M1 Max MacBook Pros.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-22
item.description: Amazon rolls out in-store pickup for products ordered from local retailers (3 minute read) Local Selling is a new set of services from Amazon that allows local and regional retailers to offer both in-store pickup and fast delivery to nearby customers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-21
item.description: Facebook is planning to rebrand the company with a new name (3 minute read) Facebook is planning to change its company name next week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-07
item.description: Twitch source code and creator payouts reportedly part of massive leak (2 minute read) An anonymous poster released a 125GB torrent on 4chan containing the entirety of Twitch’s platform and client source code commit history, details regarding creator payouts, an unreleased Steam competitor from Amazon Game Studios, and other code and software related to the platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Here’s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-03
item.description: Reddit hires bankers and lawyers as it aims for $15bn IPO (2 minute read) Reddit is hiring investment bankers and lawyers to prepare for an initial public offering.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-25
item.description: Microsoft is bringing Android apps to Windows 11 with Amazon’s Appstore (2 minute read) Windows 11 will be able to run Android apps natively.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-29
item.description: Robinhood, Interactive Brokers restrict trading in GameStop stock and options (7 minute read) Robinhood took steps to restrict the trading in GameStop stock and other related securities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-18
item.description: DuckDuckGo surpasses 100 million daily search queries for the first time (2 minute read) DuckDuckGo recently recorded more than 100 million user search queries in a day.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-17
item.description: Foxconn allegedly testing folding iPhone, projected Sept. 2022 release (1 minute read) According to supply chain reports, Foxconn is testing a folding iPhone for Apple.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-06-30
item.description: Uber reportedly looking to buy Postmates delivery service (1 minute read) Uber has made an offer to purchase Postmates.
